title: DJI Ronin-SC Gimbal Stabilizer for Mirrorless Cameras – Lightweight & Portable
description: Used DJI Ronin-SC 3-axis gimbal stabilizer designed for mirrorless cameras. Offers superior stabilization in a compact, lightweight form factor. Compatible with most major camera brands. Ideal for filmmaking, vlogging, and travel shoots. Includes gimbal unit and essential accessories. Fully tested and working.
